name: Shannon Cooper
body: Good

name: mas
body: Perfect gift for my daughter. Not ready for an expensive version, and still gets plenty of options.

name: Ann Glasser
body: I bought this iPhone for my husband and he loved it! It is the perfect size. It takes fantastic pictures and has a great display. Awesome holiday gift.

name: Info Hound
body: I bought this as a gift for someone else. I have a Samsung S20 phone myself (not unlocked and associated with my mobile carrier) and I'm happy with it. I purchased the unlocked version as a gift for someone who didn't want the phone to come preinstalled with the mobile carrier logos and apps.

name: Jodian Staple
body: Wonder gift it was even better then I expected the battery life was great and the phone was clean no sign of wear and tear it was a great value for the money

name: C.C. M.
body: This was a gift to my 11 year grandson. He said, best gift ever!

name: LjAkitt
title_review: Was a great gift for my brother.
body: I’m giving all 5 star because my brother seems to love this new phone so far?? I can’t really go in to depth about it. It was a hit as a Christmas gift for him.

name: jennifer skelton
title_review: Son is happy for his Christmas gift
body: My son received this phone as a Christmas gift it came ready to use and he is very happy no complaints

name: Richard Hunter
title_review: Ordered As A Personal Christmas Gift For Myself
body: As of right now, I can't say much of anything about the phone, because I purchased it as a Christmas gift for myself to replace my Galaxy S7, that's starting to mess up. One thing I will say, I love the color. It was described as Orchid gray, but the color I received is actually silver, and that is the color I originally wanted. One more thing, I was surprised at how quick the phone arrived after I placed my order. I guess that's because the seller is in Kentucky and I live in North Carolina.

name: Mae
body: Battery didn’t work! Was supposed to be a Christmas gift and so upset. Had to return gift and order a new one!

name: Susie
body: This item was purchased as a gift. The recipient of this gift returned the item because after the SIM card was installed in the iPhone glitches.

name: ABE
body: It was a gift

name: Thomas Jones
body: A gift for my daughter

name: Amazon Customer
body: Works perfectly and great gift for daughter

name: Warren Clark
body: It was a gift and my daughter loved it.

name: Khadija
body: I was on the fence for so long about choosing renewed instead of new and God! If i could turn back time I would have paid the extra for new. I got this as a gift for my daughter's christmas gift and I plugged it in to charge 20 minutes ago and it's at 1%. Never again will I give a gift and skim on price.

name: Jasine Johnson
body: Love the phone i got it as a gift for my niece I know she is going to love it.

name: cynthia
body: I bought it for my dad as a gift. It was just as pictured. Works great my dad likes it.

name: Daniel alguire
body: This was a gift for my son. Phone was in like new condition and I've gotten no complaints from him.

name: jkel
title_review: Received full refund, but phone should have been working before shipping
body: Wouldn't read sim card. Tried multiple sims to see if it was an issue with an individual sim. Went and got a new sim from at&t just in case. Was supposed to be a Christmas gift, so I'm glad I opened it early to test before wrapping it. That would have been awful to gift someone a broken phone. The seller issued a refund quickly.

name: Babydaisy
title_review: Do not buy from this seller.
body: The phone won’t even turn on and unfortunately it was a gift for someone who’s not in the country smh. Worst decision buying this

name: Lauren b.
body: This was the best gift I could of gave for Christmas as I well for it to be used mines well will say Is brand new

name: John Bertschy
body: I bought as a gift & sent to my girlfriend don't know about the operations of it yet but I received it well & appears to look new condition

name: Tracy
body: I bought this phone for my 11 years old daughter for her Christmas gift. This is her first phone and she love it dearly everything works good.

name: The Patterson's
body: This was a Xmas gift for my daughter and MAN..if I didn't know better I'd think it was brand new. Mint condition. I highly recommend this seller and product

name: Alejandra silvas
body: This was a Christmas gift to my husband and so disappointed we cant even use at all The phone is locked to tmobile network Which the description stated its fully unlocked

name: Kyle
body: Ordered this phone as a Christmas gift. It showed up on time, everything worked on the phone, but the battery life was diminished. Having a hard time contacting seller to be replaced.

name: Erica Green
body: Battery life 93%. Few scratches on screen. Came with case and screen protector. Good speaker and camera quality. Bought as a gift. I will be purchasing one for myself soon. Came unlocked. Easy setup.

name: EdC
body: I was nervous about buying previously owned electronics. I gave this as a Christmas gift and she loves it. I just asked her tonight if there are any issues with the phone and she said no - everything great!

name: juan reyes
title_review: Great phone for the money but must read
body: Great phone for your money hands down. But kinda regret it Bc it was a gift for a girl I was talking to and now she is with someone else. At a least I know the block button still works on the phone
